thread.title: Neighbors put up a stink over manure runoff
thread.title_full: Neighbors put up a stink over manure runoff - WCAX.COM Local Vermont News, Weather and Sports-

author: WCAX News
title: Neighbors put up a stink over manure runoff
text:
BURLINGTON, Vt. - Gov. Peter Shumlin made cleaning up Vermont's waterways a central point of his most recent State of the State address, and he singled out farmers, saying that agricultural runoff is causing about 40 percent of the phosphorus pollution in Lake Champlain.
In this week's Seven Days, Alicia Freese takes a look at how the plan of one Ferrisburgh farmer to cut down the runoff on his farm has turned community members against each other.
Watch the video more for information.
